how do i reinstall my cd drive?: my cd drive mounts the install and live version but nothing else
Use lsmod to see the loaded modules, then rmmod the CDROM one and modprobe it. That has reinstalled it, but I doubt it will fix your problem
I just told you how to "reinstall" your CDROM, but also said that this will probably not help. Reinstalling will reinstall. Actually fixing will solve the problem :)
